title: BASF works to achieve net zero carbon emissions by 2050 - CosmeticsDesign.com USA
summary: BASF, a chemical manufacturer, is working to reduce carbon emissions in its production processes and supply chain. The company has developed a digital tool to calculate the carbon footprint of its 45,000 products, providing transparency for customers. BASF aims to achieve net zero CO2 emissions by 2050 through the use of new technologies and continuous improvement processes.
product_or_process: Digital application tool to calculate Product Carbon Footprints
likely_naics_codes: ['325180 - Paint and Coating Manufacturing', '325120 - Industrial Organic Chemicals Manufacturing', '325991 - All Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing', '325998 - All Other Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing']
greenwashing: The article does not suggest that BASF is engaging in greenwashing practices.
